pr_title: KAFKA-9812: fix infinite loop in test code

timeline.message: KAFKA-9812: fix infinite loop in test code

timeline.bodyText: In KafkaStreams.close, we don't interrupt the StreamThreads but set them to state:=PENDING_SHUTDOWN. I'm checking both here, though, because the thread might be interrupted for other reasons, though, and it's generally polite to make sure you haven't been interrupted if you're blocking.
timeline.author: vvcephei
